DOC.brief_summary: This study compare safety efficacy indacaterol 150 µg take daily ( o.d . ) versus salmeterol 50 µg take twice daily ( b.i.d ) patient 40 year old old chronic obstructive pulmonary disease .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Indacaterol Once Daily Versus Salmeterol Twice Daily Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD )
